title: All Wrapped Up with You
description: After Leda’s boyfriend cheats on her and then dumps her, she resolves to devote all of her attention to her schoolwork. Dating just isn’t worth it. But there’s more to learn in college than just what’s taught in classes – and her charming but aloof classmate Paolo wants them to teach each other.A complete novelette-length love story: approximately 9,700 words.
author: Meredith Acker
